channel.title: Comments on: Edge of my seat
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: PickerLeech
item.dc:creator: PickerLeech
item.description: I just got a draw. Didn't know that was a thing
item.content:encoded: I just got a draw. Didn’t know that was a thing

item.title: By: LoneRonin747
item.dc:creator: LoneRonin747
item.description: These matches are the fun and challenging ones. Rather than when your team is still at 300+ tickets and the enemy team lost by then.
item.content:encoded: These matches are the fun and challenging ones. Rather than when your team is still at 300+ tickets and the enemy team lost by then.

item.title: By: Technical-Milk-346
item.dc:creator: Technical-Milk-346
item.description: These be the most hype matches

item.title: By: Pleasureman_Gunther
item.dc:creator: Pleasureman_Gunther
item.description:
Those are the best games.
The other day my side was leading for the entire match in a conquest game.
We're up about 75 vs 45 tickets.
Then the opposing side captures multiple points almost simultaneously and takes the lead. There was not enough time/tickets left for us to regroup and re-capture enough points.
Wasn't even mad.
item.content:encoded:
Those are the best games.

The other day my side was leading for the entire match in a conquest game.

We’re up about 75 vs 45 tickets.

Then the opposing side captures multiple points almost simultaneously and takes the lead. There was not enough time/tickets left for us to regroup and re-capture enough points.

Wasn’t even mad.

item.title: By: 80spopstardebbiegibs

item.description: Love a match like that, almost always coincides with me having a great squad around me
item.content:encoded: Love a match like that, almost always coincides with me having a great squad around me

item.title: By: KaptainChunk
item.dc:creator: KaptainChunk
item.description: Win or lose, if the score is within 50. These are the best matches.
item.content:encoded: Win or lose, if the score is within 50. These are the best matches.

item.title: By: bynarie
item.dc:creator: bynarie
item.description: I dont get these close matches very often, and they're the best. Nice job. Yea I too have maybe 1 draw on my record.
item.content:encoded: I dont get these close matches very often, and they’re the best. Nice job. Yea I too have maybe 1 draw on my record.
